    • Method Detail

      • test

        public void test()
        The method called when the step should be executed.
        First it creates a node via ExtentTest.createNode(GherkinKeyword, String). Then, it executes the runner.
        If an error or exception occurs, it throws them as either StepError or StepException and marks the node as failed of fatal respectively.
        If skip() is set, the consumer isn't execute. However, the node is still created but marked as skipped.

      • skipStep

        public void skipStep()
        Skips the step
